com.viaoa.jfc

Class OATextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextArea
              • com.viaoa.jfc.OATextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJFCComponent, OATableComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class OATextArea
extends javax.swing.JTextArea
implements OATableComponent, OAJFCComponent
    Example:
    This will create a JTextArea that will automatically display the Notes property of the active object in a Hub of Employee objects. 
        Hub hubEmployee = new Hub(Employee.class);
    OATextArea txta = new OATextArea(hubEmployee, "notes", 8,30); // 8 rows, 30 columns
    txta.setLineWrap(true);
    txta.setWrapStyleWord(true);

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    OATextArea, Serialized Form
